Question.Subject: point of chatroulette?
Question.Content: today i went on chatroulette.com to find out what its all about. i clicked new game without reading much of the info, n i got his dude just staring at the screen he was old. i hit deny for the use of my camera, and when i saw that guy pop up i ex-d it all out. i was scarred-ish. this seems kinda pointless to me, and most people would probably get really immature about it and go nude or some stupid stuff. so what do you think its for.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
I think it's for accidentally viewing random male genitalia.
That's really all you see on it, anyway.

Answer.Content:
I think it's for accidentally viewing random male genitalia.
That's really all you see on it, anyway.
ChatLack.com is like chatroulette but with photos instead of webcam.
